doc:
Clifton Davis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clifton_Davis 0 Clifton Duncan Davis (born October 4, 1945) is an American actor, songwriter, singer, and pastor. Davis starred on the television shows That's My Mama and Amen. Davis also wrote several hits for The Jackson 5, including "Never Can Say Goodbye" and "Lookin' Through the Windows." Clifton_Duncan_Davis ( born October_4_,_1945 ) is an_American_actor , songwriter , singer , and pastor . Davis starred on the_television shows That 's My_Mama_and_Amen . Davis also wrote several_hits for The_Jackson_5 , including " Never Can_Say Goodbye " and " Lookin ' Through the_Windows .
